Posts.Content: HI my lovely friends chemo done, picc out and im over the moon like the dog that got the bone and the cat that got the cream. Mum n dad have been crying god bless em. Thank you to you all for the support, advice and encouragement next step operation. Love and big hugs to all Mrs Pat n family.xxx
Posts.Title: DONE IT !!!

Posts.Content: Thank you AliG, I cant stop smiling for once. How are you doing after your op.? xx

Bit of a dull n damp day here so looks like housework is on the agenda. Love n hugs to you all Pat.xx
Posts.Title: Salt Water

Posts.Content: Hi Ali, sorry for late reply,all went ok up to now with 1st tax. Feeling ok today just hope it lasts ha ha!!!. Had bit of upset last night mum rang me and announced that she does not want to go ahead with anymore tests as she has had enough. We all feel so shocked not told dad yet. My big bro is away for the weekend now so we are left to cope. I was so stressed ended up having a fag or two. Hows you hunny? lovely in clee this morning.xxxx
Posts.Title: mrs pat !!!!!!!!

Posts.Content: Mum just rung she coming home this aft. am stressed now will be on a pack of 20 by the end of the day.xxx
Posts.Title: mrs pat !!!!!!!!

Posts.Content: Jacky 2108, what an amazing post to read. Have you thought about writing for a living. Pat.xx
Posts.Title: Can good things come from having Cancer?

Posts.Content: Hi. I am due to have my 2nd chemo next week so feel new to all of this. Being diagnosed with cancer felt like the end of the world and sometimes still does. I have since starting my journey realised how much we take for granted in life. A wage coming in, a day out and so much more. Friends mean the world most of the time but true friends stay true at a time that matters. My one and only big brother never really spoke to me but we are now true family. Having cancer no matter what cancer changes your complete attitude on life and people around you. I have the most wonderful husband and the kindest and caring family I feel so humble towards them. Â  Pat. xx
Posts.Title: Can good things come from having Cancer?

Posts.Content: Hi Mo, so pleased chemo is on for you tomorrow last one mate hurray. I do feel a lot happier now that things are being sorted with ma n pa just hope the meals are good cos they will moan. Like you im sick of the rain we had a big thunderstorm on monday teatime the poor dog nearly s..t herself. Suns out a bit today but the wind is nippy. We bought the bedding plants last weekend still not got them in although the tortoise munched his way through the begonias so thats a few less, the sod. Good luck for tomorrow Mo, Love Pat.xxxÂ
Posts.Title: Look Good Feel Good

Posts.Content: Good morning Mo, Â pleased you enjoyed the lgfg session. I have mine on 10th june only downside is I have to go to Hull as Grimsby dont do it. Good news as mum has now resolved herself to the fact that they need some help so big bro is on that case, they are also sorting some meal deliveries out. Knowing that has put my mind at ease a bit. To be honest with you I havent felt much different on the reduced dose, I have still been very knackered and had joint pains galore. But like you 1 to go. Hope your bloods are okay. We have booked 2 nights away end of June before my op to Whitby. Staying in a guest house overlooking the abbey I have my eldest nephew n his family live there but dont want to stay with them we just want to chill. Let me know if chemo on, Love Pat.xxxÂ

Posts.Title: results ...GOOD LUCK

Posts.Content: Hello Shaz, I am nowhere near stage of the journey yet but I just wanted to reply and send you all of my love and best wishes. I do hope that somebody answers your worries soon. Love Pat.xxxx

Posts.Title: Bra advice please.

Posts.Content: Many thanks Helen, Dad has agreed to go into a home in a few more days will break my heart to see it but he knows that I am unable to run around after him. He is 92 bless him. I saw my bcn yesterday and she has told me to get in touch if I need any help. Will let you know how things go. Mum is in the best place but is a very poorly lady. Love Pat.xx
Posts.Title: Good news and bad.!!

Posts.Content: Ta Ali, I wont stop my treatment promise, it was said in the heat of the moment. You would love dad he has a wicked sense of humour am spending the afternoon with him hope he gets the whisky out.xxxx
Posts.Title: Good news and bad.!!

Posts.Content: Morning ladies, first Judith the pics of R Wilson made my day, Second Ali pleased you got legs sorted, third I had ultrasound yest. and the good news is the tumours shrunk not a lot but its on the move.Then I got a wake up call on arriving home mum had been taken to hosp with liver n kidney failure as far as I know they are doing their best for her I know she is an old lady but she is still my mum. Am now looking after dad as best as I can. Thankfully I am feeling ok at the moment and not due chemo till next thurs. Sorry to go on but my heads in a mess now. Love to you all Pat.xx
Posts.Title: Good news and bad.!!

Posts.Content: Hi ladies, thank you so much for your concern regarding mum. All I can say at the moment she is comfortable so they say. Her liver and kidneys are not good but she is a strong lady. I am not to go and visit due to infection which hurts. Dads in good form bless him . Narna I have chemo 4 next thurs tax and also start herceptin injections too. Got 3 tax then op and after that rads. Once again ladies many thanks love to you all Pat.xxx
Posts.Title: Good news and bad.!!

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies, Im confused now. I was to be on tamoxifen first but my onco asked me when I last had a period which was approx 7 yrs ago, so he put me on anastrozole. Im 53 by the way. Love Pat.xx
Posts.Title: anastrozole versus tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Hi Vickie, Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  lovely to hear from you and so pleased you are doing well, may it carry on. I am doing good had a couple of off days in the week but feel ok. Had my picc line flushed and cleaned yest the nurse sed the dressing was to tight no wonder it was sore. It feels a lot better now. We have lovely sunshine here at the moment ( cleethorpes ) so off in the shower and then the pub for a couple of halfs. We have also had our mad dog for a long walk. Â  Â  Â  Â  Take care hunny stay in touch Pat.xx

I have so far been good , couple of days of not wanting to do much so didnt I am doing as the lovely ladies here say and do what your body tells you. Take the tablets they give you mine helped. Only trouble I have so far is my picc line is a bit sore. Doctor has put me on a course of antibiotics now so fingers crossed. Hope all goes well for you on thurs. please let me know, Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â love and hugs Pat.xx
Posts.Title: One down.!!

Posts.Content: Morning Vickie, Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  or rather late morning Ive just dragged myself out of bed only got up cos the dog wants a wee. My chemo unit use heat pads to help your veins come up hope yours do.Will be thinking of you tomorrow hunny. Im finding it strange being off work, Iam a housekeeper at a local hotel and due to the nature of the job Im not to go.Roll on the good weather so I can enjoy the garden, saying that its sunny today. Keep in touch Â love n hugs Pat.xx

Posts.Title: Is The Third Tax The Worst?

Posts.Title: Tax reduction

Posts.Content: Hi Mo, nice to hear from you, pleased to know that your stepdad is doing well, fingers crossed for him. My parents!! Well mum came home from hospital after refusing further tests and I am afraid to say that I am unable to help much. She even refused home help which was offered. So wayne (hubby) and my brother are doing all they can but they have to work. I try not to get to upset but its hard not to. Let me know about tomorrow I do hope they say yes. Take care love Pat.xxx

Hope all good on Friday let me know, Take care love Pat.xxx
Posts.Title: Tax reduction

Posts.Content: Hi ladies, saw my oncologist today and he has agreed to reduce my final 2 doses of tax by 20% so hopefully the side effects wont be so harsh. The good news after he examined me the tumour is breaking up. Bit like me the past 10 days!! Apparently my sore n scabby nose was caused by the tax. Love Pat.xxx

Posts.Title: Half way.

Posts.Content: Morning Ali, I have lost all of my finger nails, the last one only the other day. Mine are starting to grow very slowly and have a long way to grow too. My hair is about a cm long and so so baby soft. All I am using on my nails is almond oil. Also brows and lashes are coming good. Love Mrs Pat n co.xx
Posts.Title: neddys/moaning cows club !!!!

Posts.Content: Morning ladies, due to have my op a week tom. Have high BP which am on tablets for and have check up at GPs today. Was told in no uncertain terms at the hospital that my op will be cancelled if my BP is not down by friday. That sent me stressing, has anyone any magic tricks to lower it quickly. Love Pat.xx
Posts.Title: Impending op and high BP.

Posts.Content: Thank you Maggie, seen my GP and he has upped my tablets from 2.5mg to 10mg one a day. I am on Ramipril. He said there is no wonder bp is high and try not to stress. Just the thought of having my op postponed is enough, fingers crossed that wont happen. Love Pat.xx
Posts.Title: Impending op and high BP.

Posts.Content: Thank you ladies for your replies, I think I will need a bottle of brandy before wednesday.xxx

Posts.Content: Morning hunny, Ta for best wishes will pass em on. Ma n Pa are pretty good I do miss not seeing them everyday costs me a bomb on the phone. Its still raining ere but tomorrow is meant to be the start of the hot weather at last. MD sed woof ( in her sleep, lazy cow!!) xx

Posts.Content: Hello Im still here everyone. I cant believe how quick the year has gone by. I had my first year check and all is good in that department thankfully. I am thankful that Dad saw me beat BC that is all he wanted last year. Happy 1st anniversary Fiona and heres to a long and lasting friendship. Love to everyone Mrs Pat, MD, and Timmy xxxxx

Posts.Title: 1st cycle of EC this Wednesday

Posts.Content: Well done on your final rads. I finished mine 3 weeks ago about the 9th day after the last one I started to feel my boob hot and also began to peel. Like sunburn. I just slapped on E45 all of the time as for swimming cant help on that one as I swim like a brick. Love Pat.xxx
Posts.Title: Finished Radiotherapy !

Posts.Content: Morning Fiona, I have had 1 fec and due to have number 2 next week. Listen to the nurses advice, take the tablets they give you and most of all do what your own body tells you to do. Take it easy for a few days. Hope all goes well for you will be thinking of you Love and hugs Pat.xxxxx

Posts.Title: A smile to start today.

Posts.Content: Morning ladies and uncle George, just catching up on posts and sending you all love and hugs. My fundraising is still ongoing, we have been given a footie shirt signed by Kevin Keegan when he played at Liverpool that is going as a name card prize this weekend. Being a lfc fan I would love to win it. I have been to work this week only done 10 hrs as at the moment thats enough for me. As you may have read on here I am now working for my hubby!!!!! I feel so good for getting back to doing something and for once since January have not sat dwelling and moping about. Wayne is stressed to hell but we seem to have had a good first week, and its pay day today hurray. Love to all Pat.xxxx
Posts.Title: My new life.

Posts.Content: Sounds like you are talking about my mad dog George she a dawg possessed bless her. Been trying to post a piccie but no luck yet. Will keep trying, not very good with modern tech. Talking of docile we have a 65yr old tortoise who is on the move in his box due to the sunshine. Lucky things been asleep since october. The dog loves him. Pat
Posts.Title: Silly Question??

Posts.Content: Mrs Bs dog lovely. I took some photos yesterday Ali took me ages cos she wont stay still for long. I will keep trying to post one. Must say I am always pleased when the tortoise gets up cos springs ere.xxx
Posts.Title: Silly Question??

Posts.Content: Hello, I have a rescue dog and am myself undergoing chemo. I was told that hygiene is paramount when having treatment and to be careful around pets. Bonnie senses that there is something not right but she has been and still is my best pal through all of this. Always there with a love and a wag . I am careful with her ie no face washing or cleaning up, but what great company and good exercise. Love Mrs Pat.xx
Posts.Title: Silly Question??

Posts.Content: Hi Ali, its a scan to check your bone density, had to have it cos Im on anastrozole for 5 yrs. Dont know the results as they get sent to my onco.xxx

Posts.Content: Thanks Margy, I seem to have been told so much and my brain has just gone on strike. All my appts are at 2pm.xxx

Posts.Content: Ta George.xx
Posts.Title: Quick question.

Posts.Content: We both got new passports last year, would have loved a week in the sun but dont want to risk it at this moment. A dutch dash will do fine can stock up on bombay gin for the x word. Its bunk beds on the ferry that will be a laugh to start with.xx
Posts.Title: Quick question.

Posts.Content: Hi Suse, your words in your post are lovely and certainly true. I have not been to good today 2nd week in from 2nd chemo and my dog has not left my side. Love Pat.xx

Love us all.xxxx

Posts.Title: No place like home !

Posts.Title: Food question.?

Posts.Content: Good afternoon my friends, just got home on leave from hospital. Have to go back 9am tomorrow to see onc. Was taken in on wed morning felt so poorly high temp very sore throat and severe toothache. To cut things short teeth are fine and so is throat now. Blood count is now up to what it should be too. Looking forward to a decent meal and a good nights kip. Hope all of you lovely ladies are doing good. Love and hugs to you all Pat.xxxxx
Posts.Title: No place like home !

Posts.Content: Many thanks ladies for your advice at the moment eggs are the last thing on my mind My ankles are like balloons came on today while had my feet up in the garden.??

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends, not been on for a few days have been a bit down in the dumps. Eyes still not good have herceptin this aft. so going to tell em, legs ache n ankles still swell enough of my moaning now. We are going to Whitby on thurs for 2 nights break. The room we have booked in the hotel has a view of the abbey and harbour at least if its raining we have got something to look at. Dont think I shall do the climb to the abbey somehow!! Maybe on hubbys back. Ali owl ma n pa send their love and MD lots of woofs. Love to you all Mrs Pat.xx Â P.s. Sick of eggs now.!!
